Control Name: PERF 5.3 Choose appropriately sized dedicated connectivity or VPN for hybrid workloads
Control Statement: When there is a requirement for on-premise communication, ensure that you have adequate bandwidth for workload performance. Based on bandwidth requirements, a single dedicated connection or a single VPN might not be enough, and you must enable traﬃc load balancing across multiple connections.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 5.3 Choose appropriately sized dedicated connectivity or VPN for hybrid workloads
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you conﬁgure your networking solution?
